title: Location India. Need to incorporate an JIO esim in my pixel 3XL MOBILE phone.
content: Location India. Need to incorporate an JIO esim in my pixel 3XL MOBILE phone. At present I am using a Vodafone SIM CARD in my device. Please advise how I can set up a JIO ESIM in my phone.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
